title: New: HUNTAR – Naked Noises
body:
Cropping up toward the early stages of the year with his beautiful debut outing, _Expectations_, **HUNTAR** well and truly put his name at the forefront of emerging British acts.

On his second track, _Naked Noises_, he builds on the late night vibes, yet with an even more outwardly pop sleekness to it. Put this on your summer mixtapes now, because you can guarantee you’ll be hearing this everywhere before too long. Check out Naked Noises below, and keep up with HUNTAR on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/pages/HUNTAR/1432734313605024?fref=ts).
